program main
    implicit none
    integer(8) :: mod = 998244353_8
    integer(8), dimension(0:4000, 0:4000) :: nchoosek
    integer(8) :: i, j, k, n, pairs, active, times2, temp, total, choice, term1, term2
    integer(8) :: ii, jj

    ! Precompute nchoosek

        nchoosek(i, 0) = 1_8
        nchoosek(i, i) = 1_8
    end do

    do i = 2, 4000
        do j = 1, i-1
            nchoosek(i, j) = mod(nchoosek(i-1, j) + nchoosek(i-1, j-1), mod)
        end do
    end do

    ! Read input
    read(*,*) k, n

    ! Process each i from 2 to 2*k
    do i = 2, 2*k
        if (i > k) then
            pairs = k - i / 2
        else
            pairs = (i - 1) / 2
        end if

        active = k - 2 * pairs
        if (mod(i, 2) == 0) active = active - 1

        times2 = 1_8
        total = 0_8

        do j = 0, pairs
            choice = mod(times2 * nchoosek(pairs, j), mod)
            times2 = mod(times2 * 2_8, mod)

            temp = active + j - 1
            if (temp < 0) cycle

            term1 = nchoosek(n + active - 1, temp)
            total = mod(total + choice * term1, mod)

            if (mod(i, 2) == 0) then
                term2 = nchoosek(n + active - 2, temp)
                total = mod(total + choice * term2, mod)
            end if
        end do

        write(*, '(I0)') total
    end do
end program main
